category: Member sport organization regulations/Article 19-3 (Determination of elected candidates)
contents: Article 19-3 (Determination of elected candidate) ① The election of the chairman shall be conducted by secret ballot, and the person who receives the majority of valid votes shall be determined as elected candidate. ② If the number of majority votes is equal, the older person is determined as the elected candidate. ③ If there is only one candidate, the Election Commission shall review the reasons for the officer's disqualification in accordance with Article 26 and, if there are no deficiencies, determine that one person as the elected candidate without voting. Revised on October 6, 2021 [This Article Newly Inserted on December 20, 2018]
